programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave) S2 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave»Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over) S2 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over»Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et l'album souvenir) S1 (18/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et l'album souvenir»Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les marionnettes de Chloé) S1 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Les marionnettes de Chloé»Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa fait de l'exercice) S1 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Papa fait de l'exercice»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Les aventuriers de l'oeuf perdu) S6 (n°34)
programme.desc: «Les aventuriers de l'oeuf perdu»Bayou Chicken Farmers Deema and Goby discover an unusual egg on their farm one morning, and set off on a bayou river adventure to find the egg's mama. Can they return the egg before it hatches...and before a big bayou gator catches them?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Viens rire avec Blue !) S1 (7/17)
programme.desc: «Viens rire avec Blue !»Josh is being silly but still can't get Blue to laugh! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what will make Blue laugh. While we look for clues we find patterns with a goofy gopher and locate all the mixed-up things in Silly Town.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La chanson de Blue) S1 (8/17)
programme.desc: «La chanson de Blue»Josh wants to find out which song Blue would like to sing and of course Blue's Clues offers a solution.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend»The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.// While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le grand trésor des pirates) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Le grand trésor des pirates»Santiago's Greatest Treasure: When Bonnie Bones steals a chest of pirate treasures, Santiago learns just how much he needs his crew. (S1, ep 9a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coule ou flotte) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Coule ou flotte»Sink or Swim: The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes. (S1, ep 8b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Deep Goo Sea) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Deep Goo Sea»Deep Goo Sea: William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation. (S1, ep 13b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger) S9 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger»When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le club nature) S2 (19/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le club nature»Paddington's Nature Club: Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? (S2, ep 19a).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma meilleure amie) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Ma meilleure amie»Suzy vient passer l'après-midi chez Peppa. George n'est pas autorisé à se joindre à leurs "jeux de grandes filles", disent-elles, et il est bien triste.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Polly le perroquet) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Polly le perroquet»Peppa fait la connaissance de Polly le perroquet, le nouvel animal de compagnie, très bavard, de ses grands-parents.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Cache-cache) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Cache-cache»Peppa adore jouer à cache-cache. Elle trouve que c'est le plus drôle et le plus palpitant de tous les jeux d'extérieur qu'elle connaisse...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Backwards Day) S1 (n°61)
programme.desc: «Backwards Day»Backwards Ron Day: Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. (S1, ep 61).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Stuck) S1 (n°62)
programme.desc: «Stuck»Froga has made Christopher a homemade helmet in watermelon, with ear holes for his stuffed animal Geegee - but when Froga hand gets stuck inside one of the holes, it's an adventure trying to release her.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon) S3 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon»Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Ruben l'extraterrestre / L'anniversaire d'Alex) S8 (3/26)
programme.desc: «Ruben l'extraterrestre / L'anniversaire d'Alex»Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les rollers de Danny) S7
programme.desc: «Les rollers de Danny»Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater: A mixed-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them! (S7, ep 14a).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré»Rammy's tips about focus and meditation come in handy when Mister Staal's Replicator makes donuts rain in Midden Bos. When Kai takes out his Hydropower on an ice cream machine, it turns into an unhinged ice bot!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco) S2 (n°17)
programme.desc: «La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco»Who has put a new fountain in Crystal Lake which is against Park Rules? And it's upsetting Fish Hook! // Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green»Paddington Shares A Good Deed: Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington and says he can thank him by passing it on to someone else, which is harder than it sounds! (S2, ep 14a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Lemonade) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Lemonade»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Trésor légendaire / La Journée du oui) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Le Trésor légendaire / La Journée du oui»After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say "yup" to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William Manta: News Fish) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «William Manta: News Fish»William Manta - News Fish: While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. (S1, ep 18a).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Vegetable Pie) S1 (n°42)
programme.desc: «The Vegetable Pie»Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Four-Leaf Clover) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «The Four-Leaf Clover»The Four-Leaf Clover: Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her! Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win. (S1, ep 18).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Echange de rôles) S1 (63/78)
programme.desc: «Echange de rôles»Switcheroo: When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (La chaussette disparue) S1 (64/78)
programme.desc: «La chaussette disparue»When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his Smell Better Machine.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Present for Ron) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «A Present for Ron»Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Trip to the Moon) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «The Trip to the Moon»Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La halte-garderie) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «La halte-garderie»Peppa joue dans une pièce de théâtre. Elle est le Petit Chaperon rouge, tandis que Danny, le chien, est le grand méchant loup et Rebecca lapin, la grand-mère...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Maman Pig travaille) S1 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Maman Pig travaille»Peppa accidentally crashes Mama Pig's computer. Papa Pig is trying to get it right.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mystères) S2 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Mystères»Après avoir regardé leur émission de télévision préférée, Peppa et George veulent, eux-aussi, devenir des détectives fameux. Papa Pig leur donne un mystère à élucider...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les bulles) S2 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Les bulles»Peppa et George aiment bien les bulles de leur boisson pétillante. Maman Cochon les envoie dans le jardin pour jouer avec ces bulles...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le magasin de porcelaine) S4 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le magasin de porcelaine»While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild»Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Bababam / Les barbamartiens) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Bababam / Les barbamartiens»Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Agent spécial Blaze) S6 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Agent spécial Blaze»Special Mission Blaze: When a nefarious villain steals every toothbrush in Axle City, Blaze's only chance at saving the day is to become Special Mission Blaze! (S6, ep 16).

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Derby Dino) S6 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Derby Dino»Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les trois oiseaux / La course de caisse à savon) S7 (10/26)
programme.desc: «Les trois oiseaux / La course de caisse à savon»Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock. // Adventure Bay is holding a kids only soapbox derby race when a mysterious newcomer named ''Hum-Kid'' shows up and breaks the rules!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La mine d'or perdue / La maison connectée de l'oncle Otis) S7 (13/26)
programme.desc: «La mine d'or perdue / La maison connectée de l'oncle Otis»Uncle Otis takes a trip to a lost gold mine. After wandering off course, Ryder and the Pups must save him from the booby-trapped mine. // Uncle Otis's installs a Smart Home 3000, in his cabin, that ends up trapping Uncle Otis and Mr. Wingnut inside!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Cosmic Circus / A Hole Lot of Trouble) S2 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Cosmic Circus / A Hole Lot of Trouble»Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely? // Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (The Supersized Sunflower) S2 (n°10)
programme.desc: «The Supersized Sunflower»The Supersized Sunflower: Ricardo hosts a sunflower competition, but Lola is worried hers is ill - surely a little Wood Power will perk it up? (S2, ep 10a).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave) S2 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave»Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over) S2 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over»Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (The Museum) S1 (n°39)
programme.desc: «The Museum»Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une chaude journée) S1 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Une chaude journée»It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les marionnettes de Chloé) S1 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Les marionnettes de Chloé»Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa fait de l'exercice) S1 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Papa fait de l'exercice»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.desc: «Les aventuriers de l'oeuf perdu»Bayou Chicken Farmers Deema and Goby discover an unusual egg on their farm one morning, and set off on a bayou river adventure to find the egg's mama. Can they return the egg before it hatches...and before a big bayou gator catches them?

programme.desc: «Viens rire avec Blue !»Josh is being silly but still can't get Blue to laugh! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what will make Blue laugh. While we look for clues we find patterns with a goofy gopher and locate all the mixed-up things in Silly Town.

programme.desc: «La chanson de Blue»Josh wants to find out which song Blue would like to sing and of course Blue's Clues offers a solution.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend»The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.// While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le grand trésor des pirates) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Le grand trésor des pirates»Santiago's Greatest Treasure: When Bonnie Bones steals a chest of pirate treasures, Santiago learns just how much he needs his crew. (S1, ep 9a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coule ou flotte) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Coule ou flotte»Sink or Swim: The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes. (S1, ep 8b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Deep Goo Sea) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Deep Goo Sea»Deep Goo Sea: William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation. (S1, ep 13b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger) S9 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger»When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le club nature) S2 (19/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le club nature»Paddington's Nature Club: Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? (S2, ep 19a).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cerf-volant) S1 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Le cerf-volant»Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le pique-nique) S1 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Le pique-nique»Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les instruments de musique) S1 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Les instruments de musique»Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Une rencontre mystérieuse) S1 (65/78)
programme.desc: «Une rencontre mystérieuse»Mysterious Visitor: Bubu is eager to meet a real space alien so he builds a homemade antenna and sound box to communicate with outer space. (S1, ep 65).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Squeaky Boots) S1 (n°66)
programme.desc: «The Squeaky Boots»The Squeaky Boots: Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of hide and seek, but Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy squeak! (S1, ep 66).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Même pas cap ! / Roy) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Même pas cap ! / Roy»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La visite de Magenta) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «La visite de Magenta»Blue's friend Magenta is coming over today! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do with Magenta. During our search for clues, we identify opposites and check out animal footprint with our friends Shovel & Pail.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest) S9 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest»With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots) S1 (7/20)
programme.desc: «Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots»A meteor hits Earth and Mister Steel's heroic demeanor forces Deer Squad to save everyone. A dance competition in Middenbos turns into a mess.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights) S2 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights»Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals. // Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself) S2 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself»Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'mores) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «S'mores»S'Mores: Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends. (S1, ep 4b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante / Le défi du requin) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante / Le défi du requin»Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain in 'When You Wish Upon a Fish', then in 'Shark-Off', Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby Shark, le maire) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Baby Shark, le maire»Baby Mayor: The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (An Endless Story) S1 (n°48)
programme.desc: «An Endless Story»Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Collection) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «The Collection»Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Key) S1 (n°69)
programme.desc: «The Key»The Key: Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. (S1, ep 69).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fruits Surprise) S1 (n°70)
programme.desc: «Fruits Surprise»When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Spider) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «The Spider»Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Ron's treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Impatient Christopher) S1 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Impatient Christopher»Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête de l'école) S1 (20/52)
programme.desc: «La fête de l'école»Peppa and her family go to the street fair at school and do all kinds of things there. Peppa and her friends have their face painted like tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de maman Pig) S1 (21/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de maman Pig»It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le coucher) S2 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Le coucher»It's nearly time for bed. Peppa and George play outside for a tiny bit more. Then they are called in for their bath. After that, Peppa and George brush their teeth and get into bed, so Daddy Pig can read them a story. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig finally sit down to watch television, but it's been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'embouteillage) S2 (13/52)
programme.desc: «L'embouteillage»Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam. They still haven't arrived by the time lunch is ready, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them - in his wheelbarrow. There's enough delicious food for everyone in the traffic jam.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les fruits) S4 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Les fruits»Fruit: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le Grand Défi des 100 Oeufs) S4 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Le Grand Défi des 100 Oeufs»A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's adorable pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Au feu, les pompiers !) S6 (9/24)
programme.desc: «Au feu, les pompiers !»When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, it's up to Blaze to put 'em out - and to do it, he'll transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles we've ever seen!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La moustache de Monsieur Hellinger / La fête foraine) S8 (5/26)
programme.desc: «La moustache de Monsieur Hellinger / La fête foraine»The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine. // When a carnival train gets stuck in a tunnel, it results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger) S9 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger»When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Dinobot / Les Super Minis dans l'espace) S2 (20/20)
programme.desc: «Dinobot / Les Super Minis dans l'espace»Stu & Safia have a new pet which needs training - just one problem: it's a Dinobot and it takes the Deer Squad to stop it! // An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.
